_source.short_desc: Affordable, All-In-One Solution to streamline website management,  membership dues, email marketing and more. Try a Demo!
_source.long_desc:
---- TRY OUR 7-DAY FREE TRIAL:
https://www.brilliantdirectories.com/trial  ----

Brilliant Directories offers an Affordable, All-In-One Member Management Solution to streamline all aspects of your membership website or association.  A complete, turn-key solution with quick setup and free, unlimited support from real people. Includes website design, online payment processing, multi-level memberships, past due monitoring, premium member's only content, and more.
_source.pricing_details:
Monthly Plan: $145/month
Lifetime Plan: $1,450 one-time payment
_source.target_audience: We serve online membership communities who are looking for a streamlined solution to easily manage their website, members, payments and more.

media.caption: Creat Your Own Online Membership Community
Manage Members & Content from Your Own Admin Dashboard
Private or Public Directory to Search Members & Business Listings
Track & Generate Revenue from Members, Sponsors and More
Simple Setup and Easy to Use

related_products.short_desc: Connecteam - is an intuitive and customizable mobile employee directory to instantly find work contacts, vendors & suppliers.
related_products.features: Connecteam - is a mobile employee directory software with Advanced Search Capabilities for you to search & find work contacts easily. It allows you to search by title, department, location, birthday, branch, and more. Whatever is included in the employee profile can be searched! It also allows you to add additional work contacts that are not company employees, such as vendors, service providers, front desk, and more! Each work contact can be fully customized to show only relevant information.

related_products.short_desc: Directory management tool that includes search functionality, online payment processing, SEO center, lead generation & listing preview.
related_products.features: eDirectory empowers its users to publish a variety of directory-based websites that help maximize advertising revenue. With elaborate search functionality, advanced SEO reporting, and mobile access--as well as a fully customized platform--eDirectory is the performance leader in its market. eDirectory also allows your advertisers to track and adjust their marketing efforts in an age where ROI in advertising has never been so critical. Build your app with just a few clicks!

related_products.short_desc: More than ever, we need a place to bring everyone together and help each person succeed. That's Jostle.
related_products.features: Jostle's employee success platform is where everyone connects, communicates, and celebrates at work. It's the heartbeat of our own company and has helped employees in over 1,000 organizations easily belong and contribute, anywhere, anytime. With industry-leading participation rates, we're putting the joy into work and the life into organizations.

related_products.short_desc: Community recruitment engine. Monetize recruiting&business activity, build a lucrative directory of your members& job or project board
related_products.features:
Comonetize transforms any social community into a laser-focused recruiting engine. Monetize your community of professionals, freelance, or businesses.
Turn your community into a marketplace of talents or businesses, create a subscription site and a job board in just two minutes, and monetize your community while providing value to your members as well as employment and business opportunities.
We take care of the tech and financial aspects. Available in EN, SP, PT, AR, JP, and HE

related_products.short_desc: All In One Telecommunications + Crm Platform offering our omnichannel solution to streamline communication and S&OP for any business.
related_products.features: Our all-in-one platform equips you to communicate on your customer's channel of choice, better manage agents, clients, and stay miles ahead of the competition. Again we built NOLA to solve a problem within our own networks. The system is tested and proven so there is no risk of switching over. Be where your customers are with one powerful platform: all channels are unified rather than siloed.

related_products.short_desc: JetBrains Space is a unified platform for the entire software development pipeline and team collaboration.
related_products.features:
JetBrains Space is a unified platform for the entire software development pipeline and team collaboration. Find everything you need to know about the teams across your entire organization, including their subteams, members, and everybody's role.
Get an overview of the projects that each team is working on, their scheduled meetings, as well as a feed with the team's most recent updates.

related_products.short_desc: Upgrade your team Slack with the RootLo Map-Based Employee Directory and simplify workplace communication for your remote team.
related_products.features:
RootLo is a Slack App lowering the barriers to workplace communication with our dynamic Location-Based Employee Directory.   

We integrate with your Slack to pull employee contact information and gather employee (city-level) location data, to populate employee profiles on a map!  The results are big - employees find co-workers in their area to meet up with, HR can visualize location trends, and intelligent search capabilities make it quick to find any contact in your company.

related_products.short_desc: Content management system that helps publishers to build news portals, business directories, city portals, and custom directories.
related_products.features: A content management system that helps publishers to build news portals, business directories, city portals, and custom directories.

related_products.short_desc: Your own business directory, travel business, and e-commerce are just a click away, already customized for a smoother experience.
related_products.features:
Bright Directories as a SaaS is a software solution for all directorial needs. It enables you to create your very own online business directory website. With years of experience and a client base to flaunt we have been a constant name when it comes to directory websites, travel sites, e-commerce business, Job Portal or any other business.

Bright Directories has fathomed ground and stretched horizons by being a versatile software service provider making sure you have a hassle-free experience.

related_products.short_desc: Eazitron is a collection of Claris FileMaker? business management templates.
related_products.features:
Invoice management, inventory management, CRM, projects, HR, ...: everything your business needs to manage assets on FileMaker?. 

Every template is also available in an .exe (runtime) format.

similar_products.short_desc: Customizable directory platform designed for professional organizations.
similar_products.features: Easily create a powerful directory for your organization. Trusted by Fortune 500 enterprises and startups alike to power internal, public, and private client-facing directories. Everything you need in a single directory solution including: custom fields & drop-downs, multiple profile variants, profile templates, optional content approvals, private client microsites, API integrations, and more!

similar_products.short_desc: ListingProWP is an end-2-end directory solution for WordPress with no paid plugins required. Join 20K+ users. 2K+ 5-star ratings.
similar_products.features:
ListingProWP is an end-to-end directory & listing solution for WordPress with no extra paid plugins required. An All-in-One turn-key solution to build & monetize (worldwide) an online directory.

Top features incl. Search/Filter, FES, Claim, Pricing Plan, Multi-Criteria Reviews/Ratings, Inbox, Ad Campaign, Appointment Booking, Events, Coupons, User/Admin Dashboards 

Join 20K+ users worldwide. 2K+ five-star ratings.

Built-in checkout with Stripe, PayPal, 2CO, etc

Free & paid add-ons available

similar_products.short_desc: Raklet is an online directory software that allows you to list places, local businesses, members, and more.
similar_products.features:
Raklet is an all-in-one directory software that allows you to list members, events, articles and create any sort of directory. You can create custom fields for your directory, have a private social network just for your members or decide who sees what. Raklet enables you to create locak city guides, property listings or member directories.
You can monetize your members with a fully customized platform. Collect payments and drive your revenue by creating an online directory with Raklet.

similar_products.short_desc: Online directory management system that helps users create business directories, generate SEO-friendly URLs, manage featured ads & more
similar_products.features: Online directory management system that helps users create business directories, generate SEO-friendly URLs, manage featured ads & more.

similar_products.short_desc: Directory management solution that helps users launch business directories and coupon website to promote local businesses.
similar_products.features: Directory management solution that helps users launch business directories and coupon website to promote local businesses.

similar_products.short_desc: Allows you to create s classified ads website in any niche.
similar_products.features: Allows you to create s classified ads website in any niche.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based solution that lets churches create and manage photo directories and communicate with members via email and text messages.
similar_products.features: Cloud-based solution that lets churches create, manage and share their church photo directory in a variety of ways to their congregation. We provide a free online members' website and free mobile apps where members can view the church directory on their desktops or mobile devices. Our software also includes a free quick messaging service and optional text messaging plans to communicate with your congregation using the directory.

similar_products.short_desc: Complete solution for any type of directory website. Features custom listing types, monetization tools and multi-language interface.
similar_products.features: phpListings.com is a complete business directory website solution. It includes all the tools to run a profitable directory with an intuitive and user-friendly search facility, administrator and member panels, powerful monetization facility that supports automated invoicing and membership plan subscriptions. The directory software is suitable for business listings, events, places, classifieds, job postings, property listings, blogs and offers.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Community software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Community tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Community software allows businesses to connect with their customers by creating a space for sharing ideas, collecting opinions, storing Q&A data, and interacting with fellow customers and business representatives.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Content Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Content Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Content Management (CMS) software (CMS) is used for managing digital content across the enterprise and often refers specifically to managing websites and editing web content. There are many different kinds of CMS solutions on the market including both open-source and proprietary solutions. Many Content Management solutions allow the creation, modification and removal of content from the web site without extended knowledge of HTML or the expertise of a webmaster. Content Management software is related to Catalog Management software and Portal software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Membership Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Membership Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Membership Management software automates the management of membership within associations, communities ,and other member-based organizations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform group members as well as administration and business process tools for organizations. A variety of membership-oriented groups use these software applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, and collect fees as well as to recruit and retain members. Membership Management software is related to Association Management software, Church Management software and Club Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Portal software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Portal tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Portal software provides a secure, common gateway to enterprise data and applications, enabling greater efficiency and range for business-to-business, business-to-internal and business-to-consumer transactions in both self-service and on-demand environments. Portal applications typically feature robust content management systems (CMS) allowing the distribution and presentation of key data throughout an enterprise, as well as collaborative work and document synchronization features. Portal solutions also provide integration to external database resources, sales and CRM tools and a variety of management reporting features. Portal software is related to Catalog Management software, Content Management software, Knowledge Management software and Web Collaboration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Website Builder software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Website Builder tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Website Builder software makes it possible to quickly create your own website with design tools, templates, domain hosting, and coding options. They may also include widgets for social networking integrations, credit card processing, and multimedia. Several of these applications also include built-in SEO tools to help your website perform better in searches. Some related applications can be found in the Content Management software and Landing Page software categories.
